item.description: GAME ON THIS SATURDAY NIGHT! 2//11/12 at 10pm Sharp!!Come on down to the Kennedy plaza skating rink in downtown Providence this weekend for a pickup game of Broomball. The address is 2 Kennedy Plaza, Providence, RI 02903You'll need to bring $10.00, a helmet of some sort and if you have any type of gloves I would suggest that you bring those. Other items that may be useful if you have them is knee, shin and elbow pads but they are not mandatory. Sticks and balls will be provided and if you could bring a black and white shirt for teams that would be helpful.Pre game drinks will be at Blake's Tavern (122 Washington Street, providence, RI 02903.Hope to see you out there.Neil
item.how_to_find_us: We will be by the ticket office with brooms in our hands!
item.name: Pickup co-ed Broomball game
